I'd highly recommend you watch "The Blood of My Brother" if you're interested in a deeply moving story about family, revenge, and the impact of war. Justin Theroux is not an actor in this film, but as a director, he masterfully portrays the complexities of Iraqi culture during war times.

Another great pick would be "American Sniper," a powerful drama based on true events starring Bradley Cooper, who delivers an outstanding performance as a sniper trying to cope with life after serving in Iraq. This film offers a gripping portrayal of the psychological toll that war can take on its veterans.
